Spells:
Bless Water (Witch1 Tran): Makes touched 1 pint of water holy (DC 12 Will neg)
Control Water (Witch4 Tran): R1200' Raises or lowers 20 10'x10'x2' of water 40' for 200 min
Curse Water (Witch1 Necr): Makes touched 1 pint of water unholy (DC 12 Will neg)
Elemental Body III (Witch6 Tran): Self becomes large air (+2 Strength, +4 Dexterity, +4 AC, fly 60', whirlwind), earth (+6 Strength, -2 Dexterity, +2 Constitution, +6 AC, earth glide), fire (+4 Dexterity, +2 Constitution, +4 AC, resist fire, burn), or water (+2 Strength, -2 Dexterity, +6 Constitution, +6 AC, swim 60', vortex, breathe water) elemental, gains 60' darkvision, immunity to bleeding, critical hits, and sneak attacks for 20 min
Elemental Body IV (Witch7 Tran): Self becomes huge air (+4 Strength, +6 Dexterity, +4 AC, fly 120', whirlwind), earth (+8 Strength, -2 Dexterity, +4 Constitution, +6 AC, earth glide), fire (+6 Dexterity, +4 Constitution, +4 AC, resist fire, burn), or water (+4 Strength, -2 Dexterity, +8 Constitution, +6 AC, swim 120', vortex, breathe water) elemental, gains 60' darkvision, immunity to bleeding, critical hits, and sneak attacks, DR 5/- for 20 min
Geyser (Witch5 Conj): R1200' 5' sq inflicts 3d6 HP fire and 10d6 falling (DC 16 Ref half fire only), and surrounding 50' radius inflicts 1d6 HP fire, for conc + 1 rd
Seamantle (Witch8 Conj): 30' water column hinders fire spells and gives self +8 AC, +4 Reflex, 30' slam attack, and touch that extinguishes fires for 20 min
Slipstream (Witch2 Conj): Creates wave that moves touched 10'/rd (20' downhill) and gives +20' Swim for 200 min
Tsunami (Witch9 Conj): R1200' 10'x10'x40' wave moves 30'/60'/rd over land/water, inflicts 8d6 HP bludgeoning (DC 20 Fort half), +29 CMB to knock down and sweep away for 5 rd
Water Breathing (Witch3 Tran): Touched can breathe underwater for 40 hrs total

Intelligence Witch Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level Witch1
Agony Hex: R60' Target nauseated for 20 rd (DC 21 Fort ends) 1/target/dy
Blight Hex: Touch kills vegetation in 200' radius over 1 wk or inflicts -1 Con/dy
Brew Potion: Create potion for up to 3rd level spell
Cantrips: May cast 0-level spells
Coven Hex: R30' May use aid another to give target w/coven hex +1 caster level for 1 rd
Craft Staff: Create magic staff
Death Curse Hex: R30' Target becomes fatigued (DC 21 Will neg), then exhausted, then dies (DC 21 Fort suffers 4d6+20 HP) 1/dy
Ectoplasmic Spell: May cast spell targeting incorporeal or ethereal target; uses +1 spell slot
Eternal Slumber Hex: Touch or poison inflicts permanent sleep (DC 21 Will neg) 1/target/dy
Healing Hex: May use Cure Moderate Wounds effects at will 1/target/dy
Misfortune Hex: R30' Target suffers worse of 2 rolls on ability checks, attack, saves, and skill checks (DC 21 Will neg) for 3 rd 1/target/dy
Nightmares Hex: R60' May use Nightmare effects (DC 21 Will ends) at will
Patron: Knows additional spells
Retribution Hex: R60' Target suffers half of damage it inflicts (DC 21 Will neg) for 1 rd
Scribe Scroll: Create scroll of any known spell
Slumber Hex: R30' May inflict sleep (DC 21 neg) for 20 rd at will 1/target/dy
